name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"1f27c8c7-30c8-456d-92e6-339a8428c3b2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: visit_List","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"abaa8597-fbb9-4c5c-a260-0d255826f45b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_List","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function handles the analysis of Python list literals (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"[1, 2, 3]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). It transforms the syntactic representation of a list into a structural definition that the analyzer can track. It assigns the list a unique identity, creates a dedicated scope for it, and populates its internal model with the definitions of the elements it contains.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a9705f6d-6c5b-401c-93e2-efba65232d6a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"In dynamic languages like Python, lists can contain anything—integers, objects, mixed types, etc. For static analysis to be useful, knowing "Variable X is a List" is rarely enough; we need to know "Variable X is a List containing Strings." This function analyzes the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"contents","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of the list definition so that later operations (like accessing ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_list[0]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") can correctly resolve the type of the item being retrieved.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"76318a15-348b-4cb1-8630-75397aea9410","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f7efcaf4-0d0d-4ada-9d76-85f1debf911e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Identity Creation:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"deb8af26-2d33-46b7-a534-164abfbecf5b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since list literals don't have inherent names (unlike classes), the function generates a unique identifier using a counter for the current scope (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<list_1>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8d96d54c-6190-4100-ac86-d81c8e519653","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"LIST_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Definition object with this name.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"559f0a8b-d1ae-4c81-923c-d5a4d7ad61ef","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Container Scope:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"ed44c0fc-21b6-4041-bb37-dfca256a1320","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a new Scope specifically for this list definition. This treats the list as a container that "owns" the references inside it.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cf631a83-425e-4735-9b88-74e8b1b4788e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It registers this list definition in the current namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"26fef82d-9b37-43f5-adcb-6ee5c9c16721","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Element Analysis:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"317bb25d-efe3-4d4e-ab1f-285b7960809a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It pushes the list definition onto the stack to establish context.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"673e2fe0-4073-4912-ba99-b5197bebe1b8","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It iterates through every element in the list node (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"node.elts","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"abca0ad1-8286-4807-873e-4f65b3fdaa82","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"For each element, it uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"decode_node","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to figure out what it is (e.g., resolving a variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or a literal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"23ad8159-56de-45bb-a359-8e08c41c4557","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"list_defi.set_element(idx, ...)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to explicitly map the index (0, 1, 2...) to the resolved definition of the item.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"aa7ea877-f175-440f-bae2-6549f0b66810","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Code:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ea063dfd-2c88-4e46-a922-9b2e919476f1","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = 5
data = [x, "hello"]","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7cb40ea6-e62c-48ef-9a62-1291d23281ad","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analysis:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"326cee10-6c33-4b3c-8937-17aa19f3fc7e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"visit_List","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" generates a name (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main.<list_1>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2537361b-5b27-4f96-a749-7de3265c9794","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a List Definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"33cb3d5b-8a5b-4e5c-bbe3-4848786bb08d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It analyzes index 0: Finds variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", resolves it to an Integer Definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"593a6ee9-f242-4562-bea6-cd52b72f63cc","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It analyzes index 1: Finds literal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""hello"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", resolves it to a String Definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f0f3fae5-d191-4517-8127-0583e972628b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It stores this map: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"{0: Integer, 1: String}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" inside the List Definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0245f54d-892b-4d90-8b47-5f41533a20d5","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Later, if code accesses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"data[1]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the analyzer knows the result is a String.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cda451c5-5d97-49a8-ab10-70d6e123c508","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
